definition: Romeo and Juliet, 1594 tragedy by William Shakespeare 莎士比亞|莎士比亚
pinyin: Luo2 mi4 ou1 yu3 Zhu1 li4 ye4

sentences.english: This book is really Juliette's story, told in the third person.
sentences.chinese: 全书实际上是以第三人称叙述了朱丽叶的故事。

sentences.english: Right now I feel like Romeo when he first saw Julieta.
sentences.chinese: 眼前，我有了罗密欧初次遇见朱丽叶的那种感觉。

sentences.english: We are going to movies. Romeo and Juliet.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去看电影《罗密欧与朱丽叶》。

sentences.english: After the practice, Juliet goes back to Bryan's house.
sentences.chinese: 训练后，朱丽叶回到布赖恩的家。

sentences.english: She has been recast as Juliet.
At the party, he meets Juliet.
sentences.chinese: 在那个舞会上，他遇见了朱丽叶。

sentences.english: Juliet tossed her head, and said she would never marry him.
sentences.chinese: 朱丽叶轻蔑地把头一仰，声言她绝不会嫁给他。

sentences.english: Juliet was next me and I do not know.
sentences.chinese: 朱丽叶在我身边，我还能知什么。

sentences.english: This is the script of the play of"Romio and Juliet".
sentences.chinese: 这是剧本“罗密欧和朱丽叶”的原稿。

sentences.english: Jaco: We are going to movies. Romeo and Juliet.
sentences.chinese: 我们要去看电影《罗密欧与朱丽叶》。

sentences.english: Three Heads Fountain Juliet, Andrew, Rinde.
sentences.chinese: 三个头颅喷泉》朱丽叶，安德鲁，林德。

sentences.english: "Do you know the story of Romeo and Julieta?" I asked.
sentences.chinese: “你知道罗密欧与朱丽叶的故事吗”，我问道。

sentences.english: Romeo & Juliet, Julius Caesar, The Merchant of Venice.
sentences.chinese: 罗密欧与朱丽叶，恺撒大帝，威尼斯商人。

sentences.english: He is producing“Romeo and Juliet” at Capital Theatre.
sentences.chinese: 他正在首都剧场安排上演《罗密欧与朱丽叶》。

sentences.english: Julia silences him with a tender caress.
sentences.chinese: 朱丽叶温柔的爱抚使他安静下来。
